mentions.tacticalSituation: Nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Labour supporters voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats. Whether Conservative or the Liberal Democrat wins will come down to how many Labour supporters lend their vote to the Liberal Democrats. The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority. But only if enough Labour supporters back the Liberal Democrats this time.

endorsements.endorsement: With the Green Party standing aside to support the Liberal Democrat candidates in many areas, it is pretty clear who many people that donâ€™t want the Conservatives to win are now backing.

images.caption: Mike Smithson standing with foliage in the background.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Mike Smithson, Polling and Elections Expert, emphasizes the importance of tactical voting in the York Outer constituency.
